name: Celica
headline: My English Was Fluent. I Wanted to Sound Smarter.
introduction: I had classes with other teachers before, but the classes were not that challenging for me. I knew I wanted something more. Clint is very different from the other teachers I met.

story.content: I remember I told Clint that I wanted to speak English more fluently in my trial class. 'You speak English quite fluently but I can help you to sound smarter,' he advised. That was exactly what I wanted to be! From that moment, I knew Clint was different and I felt very confident in him.

Clint always points out my mistakes and doesn't pretend that he understands me when he doesn't. I work with native English speakers, but they are my colleagues and no one corrects me when I make mistakes. I don’t need encouragement; I need someone to pick up my mistakes directly.

He pays attention to what I say and follows up, so I never have to repeat my goals. He is a very genuine and professional teacher who fully understands my needs and has given me useful advice. I truly recommend Clint to all of you, especially people who are already fluent in English.

name: Rice Fan
headline: My Goal Was to Go from Good to Great.
introduction: I had been studying English for many years and my level was already quite good—I use it for my job. But I was looking for a teacher to help me get even better. The experience with Clint was very different from any other platform.

story.content: This teacher is very professional and his materials are thoroughly prepared to meet my needs. His teaching is rigorous. I usually prepare well before class—for video materials, I find the transcript, look up vocabulary, and review the questions. This makes the class excellent listening and speaking practice.

The lessons sometimes include extended reading articles and post-class writing assignments, so all my skills are sharpened. The teacher corrects errors in real-time and the exchange of ideas on many topics is great practice. I even once practiced a work proposal in class!

After nearly 20 lessons, I feel my English ability has improved even more, and I can switch between Chinese and English with fluid communication. The reason I was able to improve is because of the continuous practice and solid preparation before each class. I recommend this to anyone who is already good at English and wants to be even better.
